data.title: Commercial Residential Tile Distributor Pomona NY
data.meta_description: TC Tile is a tile distributor near Pomona, NY providing ceramic, porcelain, glass, slate, marble & tumbled marble tile, heated tile floors, Laticrete, Tec Bonding materials, & grouts.
data.text:
Founded in 1968, Town & Country Ceramic Tile, Inc. is the largest tile distributor in Rockland County, NY. The variations that we carry and display in our 2000 sqft. Showroom are cutting edge. Our showroom has many in stock items that are available for immediate use on projects, and special order items are usually available within two weeks or less. Town & Country Ceramic Tile. Inc. is a distributor of many of the most popular manufacturers. Our clients include the best known contractors and the top interior designers in the area. We only carry the highest quality products and are known in the industry for our professionalism and friendly sales team. Our goal is for you to select a quality tile that fits your project perfectly, while having a pleasant experience working with us.

Our sales team has an in-depth background of knowledge and experience necessary to help you make the right selection for residential or commercial projects. The sales designers have been with Town and Country for over three decades and they offer design advice and services from the inception of your project, to the completion of the job.

Our team has many years of experience and are passionate about making your aesthetic dreams come to fruition. You can always count on Town and Country to go the extra Tile!! Some memorable commercial projects are: Crown Plaza in Suffern, the new JCC in New City, The Sheldon at Suffern Station, McDonalds, KFC, Subway, Ramapo Cirque, Bon Aire Park, and many others!

Town & Country Ceramic Tile is the largest American Made Tile, Made in the USA Tile, Recycled and Green Tile, Residential Tile, Commercial Tile and can recommend Tile installation professionals you can trust. We provide the highest quality tile for residential projects: Fireplaces, bathrooms, living spaces, kitchens, flooring, hallways, foyers, and basements. We also provide the very best tile for commercial floors, bathrooms and waiting rooms.

Note: ALL photos supplied by Florida Tile

Are you looking to enhance the ambiance of your residential or commercial building near Pomona, NY by adding durable ceramic or porcelain tiles for decorative or protective use with low maintenance? Ceramic and porcelain tiles add a clean and luxurious look to any room, such as bathrooms, kitchens, foyers, or any other living or working space. These tiles are known for their durability, different colors and texture. They are very easy to install on floors and walls and they add an appealing look to any room in your home or office. Contact Town and Country’s great team of knowledgeable experts who will work with you to select the best option of ceramic or porcelain tile designs that fit with your lifestyle at home or business.

Looking to spruce up a room with earthy tones that add warmth and light? The word “tumbled” describes both the finish of the stone and the process used to create its finish. Tumbled marble tiles have a distinctive set of characteristics and will compliment any home design. All tumbled tiles will have a soft, smooth and worn look to them. Natural tumbled tiles will have a slightly rounded edge and corners with a soft face. Honed tumbled tile have a matte finish with a rustic edge. Polished tumbled tiles have a polished surface, but a rustic tumbled edge. Antiqued tumbled tiles have a rustic surface with small pits and a worn edge. Contact Town and Country’s great team of knowledgeable experts who will work with you to select the best option of tumbled marble tile designs that fit with your lifestyle at home or business near Pomona, NY.
